lead_paragraph: Representative Jason Chaffetz, the Utah Republican who is the chairman of the House Oversight Committee, said that the postal carrier, Doug Hughes, 61, was “lucky to be alive.”

headline.print_headline: Man in Gyrocopter Was Tracked for 30 Miles
headline.main: Man in Gyrocopter That Landed at Capitol Was Tracked for 30 Miles

snippet: Representative Jason Chaffetz, the Utah Republican who is the chairman of the House Oversight Committee, said that the postal carrier, Doug Hughes, 61, was “lucky to be alive.”
abstract: Federal lawmakers say Doug Hughes, Florida postal carrier who landed small gyrocopter on Capitol grounds, was tracked by security agencies for 30 miles through protected airspace, but was not shot down due to fears of hurting tourists.
